ygData.subject: Re: Ykesha rumor, cool weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: geez kenross!! sounds you ve lucked out this time with that outstanding score on your tier dal rapier!! WOW! i m sure most bards on this list had the same
ygData.messageBody:
geez kenross!! sounds you've lucked out this time with that outstanding
score on your tier dal rapier!! WOW! i'm sure most bards on this list had
the same reaction after glancing at the stats. *jaw hits ground* that sounds
like a keeper.

additionally, i really need to get my hands on a ykesha sometime soon. i've
been trying to get my lvl 50 boys to go after it, but they're always worried
about camping their own things; which i see perfectly understandable. but if
anyone would want to lend a hand or cut a deal... =)

pava
measure 14
cazic thule

>I heard last night from a level 50 Warrior who had just managed to score
>his second Ykesha that Ykeshas will no longer be a MOB drop after the
>next patch, since there is an equally impressive Warrior-only Scimitar
>on the test server. Has anyone heard this also? Does this imply that
>there will now be an equally impressive Bard-only weapon available, or
>do we just get hosed again?
>
>Also, I got roped into a GM event early this AM celebrating the opening
>of the Plane of Hate. At some point in the late evening/early morning,
>the event spanned from East Commons over to East Karanas. Pretty fun.
>I got to loot a nice no-drop Bard-usable weapon when a level 50 Ranger
>in my guild killed one of the event spawn:
>
>Tainted Tier'Dal Rapier Magic 19 delay 5 damage +2 dex +5 agi -5
>save disease no-drop and (i think) weight 4.5 Pretty cool.
>
>Immediately after picking this up, I was running back to the High Keep
>pass entrance from the woods and figured I'd take a whack at the
>solitary MOB in front of me and tow him back to the crowd of seventy at
>the pass. Killed me with three spells. Gack.
>
>Kenross Cantoforjado, 31 (almost 32) songs, Innoruuk
>
>
